messageIds.finished: Thank you for taking our survey. You can try [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app) yourself to create your own app. This app can be cloned from [our store page](https://appsemble.app/apps/{appId}).

# Appsemble survey
This app is a template app used to demo how a survey app could be created using [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app).
